data.title: Feintool
data.meta_description:
Feintool | 6,343 followers on LinkedIn. Achieving new dimensions together with fineblanking, forming and e-lamination stamping. | Feintool is an international technology and market leader in electrolamination stamping, fineblanking, and forming. We manufacture high-quality precision parts in large volumes from steel.

We supply the automotive industry, energy infrastructure equipment providers, and all manner of high-end industrial manufacturers.
data.text:
Get ready for the Coiltech®, International Coil Winding Exhibition in Pordenone. We are happy to give you insights into our rotors and stators for highly efficient electric motors and generators. ⚡ Learn more about our innovative tailor-made glulock® solutions as well as the unique Feintool-portfolio of products and services across the entire value chain. 💡 We are looking forward to meeting you in Pordenone at the Feintool exhibition stand: 📍 Hall 5 | booth A32 📆 18. & 19.09.2024 We also invite you to have an in-depth exchange with our specialists at Coiltech and find out more about Feintool's solutions for the automotive sector, industrial applications, and renewable energies. Contact us in advance to schedule an appointment. 👉 Ci vediamo in #Pordenone! #feintool #emobility #emotors #automotive #industry #renewables #windenergy

Realize new automotive seating system concepts in record time. Our fineblanking expertise can dramatically speed up the time to market, especially during the design and prototyping phase of new seating systems. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatingComponents #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating

Seating adjustment mechanisms designed for quality production. With the cost structure of a stamping process. Automotive manufacturers are under tremendous pressure to increase volume and reduce costs. Fineblanking achieves the net shape tolerances of a machined process with the cost structure of a stamping process. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatingComponents #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating

We’ve identified 3 significant types of risk when manufacturing automotive seating components. Read our latest article to find out more! Our solutions provide the automotive industry new possibilities in seating innovation. Fineblanking achieves the net shape tolerances of a machined process with the cost structure of a stamping process. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatingComponents #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating

𝗗𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗡𝗲𝘅𝘁-𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗛𝘆𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗱 𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝘀 𝗧𝗵𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗴𝗵 𝗙𝗲𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗡𝗮𝘀𝗵𝘃𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗲, 𝗧𝗡 𝗨𝗦𝗔 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆. Feintool continues to expand and invest to meet customer demand for next-generation hybrid-capable transmissions. “Our 47,000 sq ft. expansion represents a 25 percent increase at our Nashville facility. It is an integral part of Feintool’s ongoing strategic approach to meet and deliver a full range of automotive parts for powertrain, seating, and safety components,” says Christoph Trachsler, CEO, Feintool U.S. Operations. “Given strong sales and Feintool’s commitment to leadership in technology, this is another step in our North American strategy to offer the best value for our customers through modern equipment, automation, and vertical integration.” #Feintool #USA #Nashville #automotive

Curious about the latest innovations in fuel cell and electrolyser technology? 💧 The EFCF - European Electrolyser and Fuel Cell Forum in Lucerne is in full swing and we are part of it! Feintool and SITEC Industrietechnologie GmbH share their joint expertise in the development and production of 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗯𝗶𝗽𝗼𝗹𝗮𝗿 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘀 for 𝗳𝘂𝗲𝗹 𝗰𝗲𝗹𝗹𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹𝘆𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘀. 🎯 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝘂𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗣𝗥𝗘𝗖𝗜𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡: Ultra-precise forming processes for metalworking. 🚀 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝘂𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗦𝗣𝗘𝗘𝗗: Laser welding at top speeds with excellent weld seams. 🔎 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝘂𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗤𝗨𝗔𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗬: Quality assurance integrated directly into production. ⚡ 𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝘂𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗙𝗜𝗖𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗖𝗬: Scalable, efficient solutions - for prototypes, pre-, low- and high-volume series. Visit us at 𝗯𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗖𝟲 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗖 until Friday and discover how we are driving innovation in the hydrogen industry. #Feintool #SITEC #EFCF2024 #hydrogen #bipolarplates #interconnects #fuelcells #electrolysers #emobility

Seats play a crucial role in satisfaction in the automotive industry. 🚘 Our solutions provide seating engineers worldwide new possibilities to design and innovate the future of seating systems. To learn more about our solutions for automotive seating systems, visit our website at www.feintool.com/seating #SeatEngineering #AutomotiveSeating #SeatingComponents
